title: All 3 Exclusive 12 Old Mills for sale
author: Luke

posts.post_title: All 3 Exclusive 12 Old Mills for sale
posts.post_content:
All from the same collection, all very trimmed

Looks like I never scanned the Wheat (it looks more like Duffy than McGraw).  Let me know if you're interested and I'll get one for you.  It's a very niche market for that one, so I'm not sure if anyone will be interested.  The only other one Wheat Old Mill I've had I sold for $5k a little less than a year ago for reference.

McGraw $450
Duffy $350
Wheat $1700
